sentences.en: Check us in at the hotel and wait for my call.
sentences.cn: 去宾馆替我们办理好入住手续，然后等我的电话。

sentences.en: Family therapy showed us how to communicate with each other.
sentences.cn: 家庭疗法指导我们彼此之间的沟通交流。

sentences.en: He arranged for us all to have a drink.
sentences.cn: 他安排我们大家一起喝一杯。

sentences.en: He told us to get stuffed so we leaned on his kid.
sentences.cn: 他叫我们滚蛋，于是我们威胁他的孩子。

sentences.en: I hate it when people accuse us of that.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌别人就那件事指责我们。

sentences.en: I supported us by writing bilge for women's magazines.
sentences.cn: 我胡乱给女性杂志写点东西，维持我们的生计。

sentences.en: I would be obliged if you could read it to us.
sentences.cn: 您若能把它读给大家听，我将不胜感激。

sentences.en: If you have had a problem with the vatman, let us know.
sentences.cn: 如果您对增值税有什么异议的话，请告诉我们。

sentences.en: It is incumbent upon all of us to make an extra effort.
sentences.cn: 我们所有人都必须加倍努力。

sentences.en: Monstrously inflated prices are designed to keep people like us at bay.
sentences.cn: 疯狂飞涨的价格会使像我们这样的人走投无路。

sentences.en: My mother is coming to stay with us.
sentences.cn: 我妈要来和我们同住。

sentences.en: negotiations were hampered by an ‘us and them’ attitude between management and unions.
sentences.cn: 劳资谈判因对立态度受阻。

sentences.en: Our instinctive reaction when someone causes us pain is to strike back.
sentences.cn: 当被别人弄疼时我们本能的反应是反击。

sentences.en: Please help us.
sentences.cn: 请帮助我们。

sentences.en: Send us a donation now.
sentences.cn: 现在就给我们捐款吧。

sentences.en: She’s invited us both.
sentences.cn: 我们俩她都请了。

sentences.en: That big high-rise above us is where Brian lives.
sentences.cn: 我们上面的那座摩天大楼就是布赖恩住的地方。

sentences.en: The Emperor must realize that he has us at his mercy.
sentences.cn: 皇帝必须意识到我们任由他处置。

sentences.en: The only difference between us is the colour of our skins.
sentences.cn: 我们之间唯一的差别就是肤色。

sentences.en: The three of us manhandled the uncovered dinghy out of the shed.
sentences.cn: 我们三个人把无篷小划艇推出了棚子。

sentences.en: What is right for us need not be right for others.
sentences.cn: 对我们来说是对的东西，对别人来说未必正确。

phrases.phrase: us and them (or them and us)
phrases.tran_cn: 我们和他们，自己人和非自己人

trans.tran_en: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself and one or more other people
used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself and one or more other people
